title: Longbow Rush Into Age 3 Timing (2026)
overview: Modern Season 12 hybrid build: Start with aggressive Longbow pressure, then transition into Castle Age timing with White Tower or King's Palace based on game state.

phases.name: Dark Age
phases.description: Standard Council Hall opening with gold pull timing

key_actions.action: 2 vills to gold, build Mining Camp
When 3900 gold left in vein, pull ALL gold vills to Lumber Camp
Click Council Hall with 4 food villagers

success_criteria: Pull gold vills to wood exactly when 3900 gold remains
Smooth transition from gold to wood

common_mistakes.mistake: Pulling gold vills too early or too late
common_mistakes.consequence: Not enough gold for Council Hall, or inefficient timing
common_mistakes.fix: Watch gold vein count, pull at exactly 3900 remaining

phases.name: Feudal Opening
phases.description: Standard wood setup and production buildings

key_actions.action: 1 age-up villager builds Barracks (goes to food after)
Another age-up villager builds House (goes to food after)
All age-up vills back to sheep after Council Hall

common_mistakes.mistake: Not sending age-up vills back to food
common_mistakes.fix: Immediately send to sheep after building

phases.name: Feudal Pressure
phases.description: Aggression while setting up for Castle transition

key_actions.action: Queue Longbows + Spears, send forward at 5 Longbows + 2-3 Spears
1 villager to food, then rally gold until 5
Use deer when map control > farms

common_mistakes.mistake: No gold villagers for Castle transition

phases.name: Castle Transition Decision
phases.description: Decide on landmark based on game state

key_actions.action: Age up with White Tower for knights + resource secure
Age up with King's Palace for scaling

success_criteria: Appropriate landmark choice for game state

options.when: good map control, want knight power spike
need long-term scaling, opponent also booming

adaptations.adaptation: More spears, defensive positioning, maybe Abbey instead of Council Hall

key_insights: Key timing: pull gold vills at 3900 gold remaining for optimal transition
Stop unit production at 10-11 min for Castle timing
Landmark choice based on game state: White Tower (aggression) vs King's Palace (economy)
This build gives flexibility - can commit or transition based on opponent
